t: “Speed thrills – Koto’s Amazon rebrand shows what’s possible” - Design Week
s: 3 weeks ago - A big part of the project seems to have been eliminating inconsistencies across the way the Amazon brand shows up. Jeff Bezos’ company famously moves quickly, and this can lead to design work being done on the hoof to meet pressing deadlines.

t: What is Amazon's approach to product development and product management? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 14): There is an approach called "working backwards" that is widely used at Amazon. We try to work backwards from the customer, rather than starting with an idea for a product and trying to bolt customers onto it. While working backwards can be applied to any specific product decisio...

t: The Beauty of Amazon's "Press Release" Process
s: February 7, 2021 - I previously wrote about The Beauty of Amazon's 6-Pager and why I felt it was a fundamental innovation that improves Amazon's ability to scale its decision-making processes as a rapidly growing company. I feel similarly about Amazon's working backwards process of writing the press release first.
